Functions (functions.py)¶

This file houses all of the miscellaneous functions used elsewhere in the project.

dalme_app.functions.get_count(item)[source]¶

Gets counts of different types of content based on item input string. Valid values are: “inventories”, “objects”, “wiki-articles”, “assets”, “notarial_sources”, “sources”, “biblio_sources”, “archives”. All other values for item return None

dalme_app.functions.get_dam_preview(resource)[source]¶

Returns the url for an image from the ResourceSpace Digital Asset Management system for the given resource.

dalme_app.functions.get_inventory(inv, output_type)[source]¶

returns information associated with an inventory in the specified format

dalme_app.functions.inventory_check(_file)[source]¶

Takes the data from a DALME Inventory Package and makes sure it’s properly formatted

dalme_app.functions.menu_constructor(request, item_constructor, template)[source]¶

Builds menus based on an item_constructor and a json file describing the menu items. Menus are stored in the templates directory, under the menus subdirectory.

dalme_app.functions.tokenise(line, t_type)[source]¶

takes a line and returns a list of dictionaries, one for each token, with all the pertinent attributes
